C

com.leakyabstractions.result - package com.leakyabstractions.result
A Java library to handle success and failure without exceptions
combine(Collection<Result<S, F>>) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
Combine a collection of results into a new one.
combine(Result<? extends S, ? extends F>...) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
Combine a variable list of results into a new one.

F

failure(F) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
Creates a new failed result with a given value.
filter(Predicate<? super S>, Function<? super S, ? extends F>) - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a successful result whose value does not match the given predicate, returns a new failed result with a value produced by the given mapping function; otherwise returns this result.
flatMap(Function<? super S, Result<S2, F2>>, Function<? super F, Result<S2, F2>>) - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
Returns a new result produced by the appropriate Result-bearing mapping function.
flatMapFailure(Function<? super F, Result<S, F2>>) - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a failed result, returns a new result produced by the given, Result-bearing mapping function; otherwise returns a successful result with this result's success value.
flatMapSuccess(Function<? super S, Result<S2, F>>) - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a successful result, returns a new result produced by the given, Result-bearing mapping function; otherwise returns a failed result with this result's failure value.

G

getFailureOrElseThrow() - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a failed result, returns its failure value; otherwise throws NoSuchElementException.

I

ifFailure(Consumer<? super F>) - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a failed result, performs the given action with its failure value; otherwise does nothing.
ifSuccess(Consumer<? super S>) - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a successful result, performs the given action with its success value; otherwise does nothing.
ifSuccessOrElse(Consumer<? super S>, Consumer<? super F>) - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a successful result, performs the given success action; otherwise performs the given failure action.
isFailure() - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a failed result, returns true; otherwise false.
isSuccess() - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a successful result, returns true; otherwise false.

L

lazy(Supplier<Result<S, F>>) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
Creates a new lazy result based on the given result supplier.
lazy(Consumer<T>) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
Creates a new lazy consumer based on a regular one.

M

map(Function<? super S, S2>, Function<? super F, F2>) - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
Returns a new result with the value produced by the appropriate mapping function.
mapFailure(Function<? super F, F2>) - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a failed result, returns a new failed result with the value produced by the given mapping function; otherwise returns a successful result with this result's success value.
mapSuccess(Function<? super S, S2>) - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a successful result, returns a new successful result with the value produced by the given mapping function; otherwise returns a failed result with this result's failure value.

O

ofNullable(S) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
If the given value is not null, returns a new successful result with it; otherwise returns a new failed result.
ofNullable(S, Supplier<? extends F>) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
If the given value is not null, returns a new successful result with it; otherwise returns a new failed result with a value produced by the given supplier function.
ofOptional(Optional<S>) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
If the given optional is not empty, returns a new successful result with its value; otherwise returns a new failed result.
ofOptional(Optional<S>, Supplier<? extends F>) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
If the given optional is not empty, returns a new successful result with its value; otherwise returns a new failed result with a value produced by the given supplier function.
orElse(S) - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a successful result, returns its success value; otherwise returns other.
orElseMap(Function<? super F, ? extends S>) - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a successful result, returns its success value; otherwise returns the value produced by the given mapping function.
orElseThrow() - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a successful result, returns its success value; otherwise throws NoSuchElementException.
orElseThrow(Function<? super F, E>) - Method in interface com.leakyabstractions.result.Result
If this is a successful result, returns its success value; otherwise throws an exception produced by the given mapping function.

R

Result<S,F> - Interface in com.leakyabstractions.result
Represents either the success or failure of an operation, including an associated value in each case.
Results - Class in com.leakyabstractions.result
This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on or return Result instances.

S

success(S) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
Creates a new successful result with a given value.

T

toOptional(Result<S, ?>) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
If the given result is successful and its success value is not null, returns an optional with it; otherwise returns an empty optional.
toOptionalFailure(Result<?, F>) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
If the given result is failed and its failure value is not null, returns an optional with it; otherwise returns an empty optional.

W

wrap(Callable<S>) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
If the given callable produces a value, return a new successful result with it; otherwise returns a new failed result with the exception thrown by callable.
wrap(Callable<S>, Function<? super Exception, F>) - Static method in class com.leakyabstractions.result.Results
If the given callable produces a value, return a new successful result with it; otherwise returns a new failed result with a value produced by the given mapping function.
